title: International Women's Day, Michelle Obama, Women in Politics and Music and more.
itunes:title: International Women's Day, Michelle Obama, Women in Politics and Music and more.
description:
Happy Friday, it's International Women's Day and Fool #2 shouts out all the white women.  "Watch out there now!"  We celebrate women today.  The Queen of coolness Gayle King interviews the two live in girlfriends of "Robert" and does not make Kells look any better.  Michelle Obama gets a gym named after her at her high school alma mater.  The crew talk about the disrespect shown to Mrs. Trump by President Trump.  There are so many dynamic women in music to mention and Steve gives us an education to say the least.  Today Closing Remarks is an Ode to Women.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
